products.title: Origin (Blackout), Navy - Vertical Blind
products.description: Go navy with this rich, dark blue offering from the origin (blackout) range. This is a deep, classic shade that adds a touch of sophistication wherever it's placed, whilst continuing to add the functionality and pragmatism that you will come to expect from the origin range. This dark shade of blue will make white walls look even cleaner and crisper, and this traditional colour scheme can be accented with silver fixtures and fittings in the kitchen, along with light woods and worktops.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Bluebell - Vertical Blind
products.description: The soft, lilac-tinted blue of the palermo (blackout) bluebell will raise plenty of questions and get the whole family talking. Is it blue? Or is it dark lilac? It doesn't matter because this shade is so unique and pretty, you'll want it in your home regardless. For maximum impact, set the bluebell against pure white walls and complement with matching accessories throughout the room. Whether you're hoping for summery beauty in the kitchen, a pretty feature colour for a child's bedroom, or something to stand out in your hallway, the bluebell is a must-have.

products.title: Blackout Roller, Navy (Blackout) - Loft Blind
products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Roller Blind
products.description: With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry blossom blackout kimono blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is pollergen treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen.

products.title: Midas Stripe Blackout Sapphire Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The midas stripe blackout range comes in a variety of beautiful colour tones that will stand out in any room. The blackout feature means you can control how much light you want in the room. A rich dark blue colour, this blind will provide a stunning final touch for your window dressing. products.title: Hive Blackout Teal Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout teal perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Hive Blackout Denim Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout denim perfect fit pleated blind. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Stripy (Blackout), Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Stripy blue is a great way of incorporating the full range of blues into your house, from sky blue, light blue, all the way to navy. The variation in width of the stripes gives this high quality blackout blind a fresh and modern look. Stripy blue works perfectly when you are looking to add to, or create, a blue-themed kitchen or living room, to show of the true range of tones. Alternatively, why not fit the stripy blue in the hallway or landing, to give an often overlooked area of the home a more upbeat look? Stripy (blackout), blue - roller blind stripy blue is a great way of incorporating the full range of blues into your house, from sky blue, light blue, all the way to navy.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Bluebell - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Rubber Duck (Blackout), Navy - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new rubber duck blackout navy fabric is the finishing touch your new bathroom has been waiting for. With a playful design that's guaranteed to make you smile, combined in perfect harmony with a healthy dose of contemporary chic style, it has everything you could ever want from your new roller blinds. Match rubber duck with a range of light blue painted walls, and a whole host of trinkets on the walls.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Navy - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).
